name: 5 CD's for a FIVER!
description: Self explanatory, but here's the deal; you get 5 CDs for £5. FREE UK shipping. You can select a style in the drop down menu if you wish, but ALL CDs are randomly selected from Small Town releases over the years (albums and EPs) By buying this CD pack, you are helping Small Town Records out in huge ways. Small Town is 100% independent, every penny spent by fans in our store goes straight back in to the pot for helping develop our roster and bring on new and exciting talent. Thanks for your support.

name: The Elijah - "Live At The Underworld" DVD/CD
description:
CAT NO.: STRCD082 Also available on: itunes l Amazon MP3 The Elijah - Live At The Underworld accompanied by the Niche London String Quartet playing their debut album "I Loved I Hated I Destroyed I Created" in FULL from start to finish. The event was sold out on the evening but for those who couldn't make it or for those who want to re-live the sensational event, we can now give you this show on DVD as well as taking home the audio on CD. The DVD also contains: Live At The Underworld - The Making Of Documentary "I Destroyed" and "I Hated" Music Videos

name: The Hype Theory - "Kid At Heart" - Single USB Wristband

Includes: - Kid at Heart (single) - These Are The Times (bside) - Kid at Heart (Acoustic bside) - Kid at Heart Video - We Will Be Singing Video - Kid at Heart outtakes video - Kid at Heart artwork - The Hype Theory Comic - Pics of the Band! Not only does it come with all this awesome stuff, but all webstore orders come with a free The Hype Theory / Small Town Records goodiebag which includes pins, stickers, sweets and more!!!!
